alarms.description: A list of alarms configured for the deployment group. _A maximum of 10 alarms can be added to a deployment group_.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the alarm configuration is enabled. This option is useful when you want to temporarily deactivate alarm monitoring for a deployment group without having to add the same alarms again later.

ignorePollAlarmFailure.description: Indicates whether a deployment should continue if information about the current state of alarms cannot be retrieved from CloudWatch. The default value is `false`.
